text: Need Natalie Adams for Witchery campaign. Budget around $2,944, looking for 2 x Article contribution, 1 x Meet and greet, 3 x 15-second TikTok, 2 x Pinterest pin, 2 x Event photography. 9 week exclusivity from other similar brands. Campaign runs October 2025. Usage rights for 9 months. Engagement period: 4 months.
